entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with freezing rain near noon and with ice pellets early this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain and a few flurries near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon.
